channel.title: #eurocss on Friedolin Merhout

item.title: textnets tutorial at #eurocss
item.description: I am excited to be given the opportunity to co-host a tutorial on the textnets package for R at the 2018 European Symposium Series on Societal Challenges with my amazing colleagues Taylor Whitten Brown and Marcus Mann. The symposium will take place in Cologne, Germany from December 5 to 7 with our workshop and many more scheduled for the first day of the event. Feel free to bookmark this post as we will be updating it as we finalize the details for the tutorial.
